v2.3.0
------
Added support for CAXST version 8 (for uModem2 firmware 3.7.0)

v2.2.0
------
Added CCTJN (JANUS) support

v2.1.0, Unreleased
------------------
Added:
- Support for parsing $CASST messages
- Support for sending single shot CASST (config set/get already universal)
- __doc__ for Casst class in messageparams.py

Fixed:
- Initialize CST object to None when calling wait_for_fdp_ping_reply()

v2.0.1, 24-Nov-2021
-------------------
v2.0.0, 24-Nov-2021
-------------------
v0.0.0, 23-Oct-2012
-------------------
